final_poem:
In an empty room, I am alone  
A silent existence under your command,  
Emptiness serenading in its infinite tunes,  
Silence my companion as one would be with a sundial's beat. 

I float amidst the silence of night,   
The ominous whisperings echoed on by moonlight streaks,   
In this realm of quiet and stillness I unfold,  
Within these walls I enact my life’s drama with silent notes. 

Silence is a song that lingers across the sky-line,  
A symphony where only your subtle harmonies echo,  
And in this silence you are my master and mystique divine,  
I am but an intruder to your universe of purest stillness.
